Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the award of crime victim assistance funds for victims of overdoses where a substance was administered through deception or surreptitously
Summary: Permits award of crime victim assistance funds to victims of overdoses, where such overdoses cause death and were the result of deception, surreptitious delivery, or third-party administration of a controlled substance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the award of crime victim assistance funds to victims of overdoses, where such overdoses were the result of deception, surreptitious delivery, or third-party administration of a controlled substance which causes death
